biotools.summary: CREMA is an online tool which automatically infers regulatory networks from chromatin accessibility (ATAC/DNase-seq) or enhancer mark (ChIP-seq) data. CREMA directly processes raw data of a set of samples (FASTQ files), identifies cis-regulatory elements (CREs) , infers key transcription factors driving the observed chromatin state changes across the experimental conditions, and makes detailed predictions regarding their regulatory roles.
